title: Chilwell

content: Original Topic: [Free Entry ]üèèCONTEST ICC MENS WC 2023 AND DISCUSSIONAuthor:GladitorcomebackIntroductionWecome 2 di most excitin cricket Contest 4 di year! Di ICC Men's World Cup 2023 dey around di corner, and we're thrilled 2 bring you an electrifyin contest dat go test your cricketin knowledge and prediction skills. Predict, strategize, and compete wit fellow cricket enthusiasts 4 a chance 2 win incredible prizes!General Rules1: Usin a point-based system, we go select di top 10 earners. 2: No Registration Fees required. You have 2 earn atleast 5 merit 2 participate in di contest3: Stay engaged throughout di tournament and Increase your points by predictin daily.4: IT IS PROHIBITED 2 EDIT YOUR POST. Dis go lead 2 disqualification. 5: Pls submit your predictions be4 di start of di Match. We will not count di points once di match starts. Points BreakdownOne Time :1: Who go win di World Cup final: 200 points2: Who go score high runs throughout di tournament: 200 points 3: Who go pick more wickets throughout di tournament: 200 points 4: Who go hit more sixes throughout di tournament: 200 points Submit your Above prediction be4 04 Oct 2023 [Afta dis date we will not consider your entry.]Every Match:Toss win: 5 pointsTeam win: 5 pointsBest Batsmen: 10 pointsBest bowler: 10 points SponsorsSr.|Project Name||Project Description||Sponser Amount [ BTC]01|| BountyPortals||Marktin Agency/ Bounty & Airdrop Management||50$ worth02||Yours?||.|.Escrow Information Fund go be officially escrow by irfan_pak10 ParticipantsSr.|Username|Registeration Date01|irfan_pak10|Sept. 1802|Yours?|.Total Amount Collected 4rm Sponsors: 50$ worth BTCWinnersSr.|Position|Usernname|Amount01|ü•áTop User|X|40%02|ü•à2nd|X|20%03|ü•â3rd|X|10%04|üèÜ4th-üèÜ10th|X|20%Local BoardsAll Local Boards members havin quality 2 translate in their local boards are requested to support. Your work go be appreciated.1: ŸÖÿ≥ÿßÿ®ŸÇÿ© ICC MENS WC 2023(Arabi translation)  albon2:Tournament management go be handled by irfan_pak10 ¬†and  Gladitorcomeback ¬†who go charge a 10% tournament arrangement fee 4rm total collections.
